𓎟 Kuhle ⋍ Quelle 𓈟 𓈞 Brunn/inn

𒆪 KUˡ Kuhle "hole"

𒇥 kala₃ "Kuhle" : "excavation, trench; storeroom" Akk. kalakku 𒇥 kala₃ "Kuhle" 𒆠𒇲 ki.la₂
𒇥 kala3 LAGAB×U 𒇥 gala3 LAGAB×U 𒆽 gala4 LAGAB×AL
𒆽 kala4 LAGAB×AL 𒇏 gala5 LAGAB×KI 𒇏 gala5 <> 𒆸 LAGAB 𒇬 lagar Lager

𒄬𒇻 •Kuhle in 𒈾𒄬𒇻 na-ḫal-lu 𒈾𒄬𒇻 gorge, stream, wadi

𒅗 KA 口 kǒu "ᵏhole" opening <> Kuhle 𒅗 KA 口 kǒu 𒅴 kʲap@Luri Klappe "mouth" 𒅗 KA 开 kai1 口 opening, origin, beginning, inception

𒆠𒇲 ki'la₂ "dig" kali(Malay) @Kuhle Keil <> cladhaich খান্দা khanda 𐌲𐍂𐌰𐌱𐌰𐌽 grave grafa חפר khafár cavar excavar
